text: ahō nabivaraya! deviyan viśvāsa karana kāntāvō num̆baṭa pratignā dennaṭa num̆ba veta pæmiṇa, ovun allāhṭa kisivak ādēśa nokarana bavaṭat, ovun sorakam nokarana bavaṭat, ovun kāma apacārayē nirata novana bavaṭat, ovun tama daruvan ghātanaya nokarana bavaṭat, ovungē at hā ovungē pāda atara ovun kavara karuṇak getuvē da evan avalādayak ovun nogenana bavaṭat, yahapat kaṭayutu valadī ovun num̆baṭa piṭu nopāna bavaṭa pratignā dun viṭa eya piḷiganu. tavada num̆ba ovun venuven allāhgen samāva illanu. niyata vaśayenma allāh atikṣamāśīlīya. mahā karuṇānvitaya
